DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial compare two NN5401 ( Soluble Insulin Analogue Combination [ SIAC ] , insulin degludec/insulin aspart ) formulation biphasic insulin aspart 30 , combination metformin insulin naive subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two NN5401 Formulations Versus Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 , All Combination With Metformin Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes

Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
